description:
With this course you will learn how to create an online course. The course includes several sections: on the first sections we will speak about the basic tools to start preparing your lectures. We will see how to set the environment and the desktop, choose a microphone e the most important softwares for video recording.

Two sections are about Camtasia, for Windows and Mac: in this sections you will learn in deep how to record with Camtasia. We will also see some other software for video recording, like Jiing, QuickTime and ScreencastOmatic.

For building your course you will need some tool to build your presentations: let's have a look on Google Slide, Emaze and Prezi for this.

In the last sections we will speak about some alternatives for video recording, for Linux too. Then we will see some of the websites with the resources you could need to build your course, for downloading templates, video, audio files and images.

We will see how choosing a profitable topic and esteem a topic profitability, and how to promote and cross promote your course.
title: Software and techniques for course creation
